intro.description: I design and develop backends for web services. My skill is using technology.

about.headline: My Journey
story: As a child, I was very passionate about reading books about geniuses like Steve Jobs, Albert Einstein, or Stephen R. Covey. They were all people who changed the world – but what about me? I was just an ordinary, shy boy, even considered "useless" and unreliable.

Do you know the feeling of being looked down on by talented people, not being entrusted with responsibility? Or being taken advantage of by bad people because you’re too easygoing? I experienced it all. It made me ask myself: "Why can’t I be better?"
Then one day, I came across a life-changing quote from Jim Rohn: "Don't wish it were easier, wish you were better."
At that moment, I decided to change. In every project, I try my best so that I won’t regret it even if I fail.
Now, my life philosophy is: Always give your best to bring maximum satisfaction to everyone who accompanies you.
about.name: Minh Quân
